answers.author: Anne Marie Green
answers.text:
I'm not sure exactly what type of service you are looking for.  We have had a local access cable channel for at least 15 years.

answers.author: Thomas Farnsworth
answers.text:
I sent an e-mail to you Anne, but our City is interested in contracting for this service and is looking for a template.  If you have a contract with an outside agency would you be willing to share or alert me to another source for such a contract we could view.  Thanks


I sent an e-mail to you Anne, but our City is interested in contracting for this service and is looking for a template.  If you have a contract with an outside agency would you be willing to share or alert me to another source for such a contract we could view.  Thanks

answers.author: Phillip Smith-Hanes
answers.text:
During our last franchise renewal, the County and our local cities set up an independent non-profit to run the access channels and we all contract with that entity for services.  I've attached the County's contract for Board meeting broadcasts; I can provide additional documents if needed.

author: Thomas Farnsworth
text: Looking for contracts regarding telecommunications services for local access cable channel.
title: Telecommunications Contracts
